title: This Website
description: This website was built using Astro and is heavily inspired by the old American Megatrends BIOS, a screen which I've seen a lot since I first got my hands on a Laptop.

title: blockchain-messenger
description: An instant messaging application that uses a blockchain and multicast transmission. This was done in Java.

title: flUId
description: A website that checks if a water sample is potable or not.
